align.description: Specify how to align the actions; For horizontal mode, the default is 'left', while for vertical mode, the default is 'stretch'
align.description_zh: 指定如何对齐操作;对于水平模式，默认为 'left'，而对于垂直模式，默认为 'stretch'

vertical.description: Display actions one below the other
vertical.description_zh: 将操作一个接一个地显示
